---
title: "Radar Chart Order Test"
format: pdf
---

```{r}
library(fmsb)

# Test 1: Order [C, F, V, A, R]
test1 <- data.frame(
  Collaboration = c(5, 0, 5),
  Flexibility = c(5, 0, 4),
  Visibility = c(5, 0, 3),
  Agility = c(5, 0, 2),
  Redundancy = c(5, 0, 1)
)

radarchart(test1, axistype=2, title="Test 1: C(5), F(4), V(3), A(2), R(1)")
```

```{r}
# Test 2: Order [R, C, F, V, A]
test2 <- data.frame(
  Redundancy = c(5, 0, 5),
  Collaboration = c(5, 0, 4),
  Flexibility = c(5, 0, 3),
  Visibility = c(5, 0, 2),
  Agility = c(5, 0, 1)
)

radarchart(test2, axistype=2, title="Test 2: R(5), C(4), F(3), V(2), A(1)")
```

Look for where the HIGHEST value (5) appears - that tells us where the FIRST column plots.
